item.title: R-Type Dimensions III revealed, coming May 2026
item.content:encoded:
ININ Games has announced R-Type Dimensions III with the studio aiming to release the game in May 2026. The side scrolling shooter will feature completely rebuilt assets of R-Type III: The Third Lightning with players able to choose between 2D and 3D views of the action. ININ Games has also announced a Special Edition and Collectors Edition of the game.

The main features of R-Type Dimensions III includes:

  • A fully remastered experience with completely reconstructed assets
  • Local co-op, enhanced with new scoring and survival mechanics
  • Advanced mode accessible from the start
  • Customizable controls and quality-of-life features in the settings
  • 3D Camera settings (normal and crazy)

If you want to get the Special Edition it will set you back approximately £54, and that will net you the game, a special edition box, the original soundtrack and an artbook. There is also the R-Type III Dimensions Collector’s Edition, which is priced at a much higher price of nearly £180. That features an exclusive case cover and manual, the artbook, a two disc soundtrack, posters, stickers, bosscards, replica boxes, and 15cm resin statue of Dobkeratops facing off against the R-90. Oh, you will also get a numbered certificate of authenticity.

R-Type Dimensions III is going to be released for PC, PS5, Switch, and Switch 2.
